title: Dauids harpe ful of moost delectable armony, newely strynged and set in tune by Theadore Basille
author: Becon, Thomas, 1512-1567.
publicationStmtDate: Anno D[omi]ni. 1542. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum. Per Septennium.
publicationStmtPublisher: In Botulph lane at the sygne of the whyte Beare, by Joh[a]n Mayler for Joh[a]n Gough,
